snippet.title: Pray for Texas - Barron Trump Sings
snippet.description:
Pray for Texas 

⬇️⬇️⬇️ Watch more videos below! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://youtu.be/WBHJZs8ZeFQ
https://youtu.be/GAdihLnAiXk
https://youtu.be/SZZW8YMZlMg?si=kP7ZE5s5fhhjjpX2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hq_JjAodbY0

Lyrics
[Verse 1]
Woke up to the news, skies broke wide
Water rushing in, nowhere to hide
Families stranded, dreams swept away
It hurts to see my people live this way

[Pre-Chorus]
But I believe in hope that won’t drown
And I believe God sees us now

[Chorus]
So I pray for Texas, hands lifted high
For every heart under that heavy sky
Through the storm, through the rain
God, bring healing through the pain
You’re not alone, we’re standing strong
Texas, you’ve been brave so long
I send this prayer with all my love
To the Lone Star State, from up above

[Verse 2]
I see the lights on rescue boats
And strangers giving up their coats
Churches open, people care
It’s dark—but grace is everywhere

[Pre-Chorus]
Yeah, I believe the sun will rise
And dry the tears from weary eyes

[Chorus]
So I pray for Texas, hands lifted high
For every heart under that heavy sky
Through the storm, through the rain
God, bring healing through the pain
You’re not alone, we’re standing strong
Texas, you’ve been brave so long
I send this prayer with all my love
To the Lone Star State, from up above

[Bridge]
And when the waters fade away
We’ll still be here, every day
Rebuilding dreams, brick by brick
We’ve got your back, we won’t quit

[Final Chorus]
Yeah, I pray for Texas, faith in my soul
That even floods can’t take control
Through the storm, through the rain
Let hope rise up again
You’re not alone, we’re singing on
Texas pride is never gone
I send this prayer with all my love
To the Lone Star State, from up above

[Outro]
Pray for Texas…
God be with you always.

All content, including references to real individuals, is created for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or deceased, is purely coincidental or used in a satirical, transformative, or fictional context. This content is not intended to defame, embellish, misrepresent, or harm the reputation of any individual. No endorsement or affiliation is implied unless explicitly stated.
